resources.string: THE BEST WINGS ON THE PLANET IS HERE!
Buffalo Wings - Tangy and fiery with a classic taste
Cajun Rub - Bold flavor with Cajun spices
Sriracha Wings - Heat and sweetness with fiery flavor
Mumbo Wings - Savory and sweet D.C. favorite
Spicy Peanut Wings - Heat and nutty flavor from Georgia
Garlic Parmesan - Creamy and rich with garlic and Parmesan
Hawaiian Wings - Sweet and tangy with pineapple glaze
Hickory Smoked - Rich smoky flavor from Texas
